fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Youth, Public Health, Sport
eu_initiatives:
sport policies 
youth policies 
health policies 
social policies 
education policies
organisation_name: Unió de Federacions Esportives de Catalunya (UFEC)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
Boost high level federal and school sport. 
Take care of updating the sport equipment official list. 
Establish necessary risk coverage mechanisms which guarantee security. 
Boost the international and collaborative relations with other entities. 
Foster job opportunities for high level sport people and social groups at risk of social exclusion. 
Keep and coordinate federal sports with clubs and federation at all levels. 
Coordinate school sport activities with school sports associations.
relevant_communication:
-Constitution of a Foundation 
-Campaign against violence in sport 
-Sponshorship for athletes 
-Social projects to train and get job placement for young  people at risk of social exclusion 
-Sport center management 
-Support to 69 catalan sports federations 
-Office to support more than 8,000 sport clubs
